entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 12:39 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: NW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries. Flurries or snow squalls early this evening. Blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
